definitions.text: yellow color or pigment; the chromatic color resembling the hue of sunflowers or ripe lemons

examples: The pages of the book began to yellow

definitions.text: of the color intermediate between green and orange in the color spectrum; of something resembling the color of an egg yolk
changed to a yellowish color by age

examples: sensational journalistic reportage of the scandal
the little yellow stain of treason
too yellow to stand and fight

definitions.text: affected by jaundice which causes yellowing of skin etc
